Catalysts which may be used in the melt transesteri›
fication method for the preparation of polycarbonates are the
basic catalysts known in the literature, such as, for example,
alkali metal and alkaline earth metal hydroxides and oxides
and/or onium salts, such as, for example, ammonium or phos›
